                               apiVersion: apps/v1
                               kind: Deployment
                               metadata: {}
                               spec:
                                 template:
                                   spec:
                                     containers:
envpatcher              Update       - env:
envpatcher              Update         - name: barx
envpatcher              Update           value: bar
me                      Update         image: nginx:1.14.2
me                      Update         imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
me                      Update         name: nginx
me                      Update         ports:
me                      Update         - containerPort: 80
me                      Update           protocol: TCP
